AI Description: Maturin is a Rust-native build system for Python packages that allows users to create wheels for their Python packages written in Rust. It aims to simplify the process of packaging and distributing Python extensions written in Rust, providing a seamless integration between Rust and Python ecosystems.
Core Features: Facilitates Building Python Packages With Rust Extensions, Enables Creation Of Python Wheels For Packages With Rust Code, Simplifies Distribution & Packaging Process For Hybrid Rust-Python Projects
General Tags: Python Packaging, Rust Programming Language, Build System, Python Extensions, Package Distribution
